TopicTitle: SELV - Stockalike Expendable Launch Vehicles V.1.4 - Updated 25/09/2015

Articles.Content:
![KKwG50T.png](http://i.imgur.com/KKwG50T.png)

Hello guys! This is a modpack which includes stockalike rockets, which are (a little) based on real world rockets, but with the KSP-Touch on them.

* * *

On the beginning, I was working on only one stockalike rocket, but making it was quite funny, so I packed that into this project. As the name says, the goal of this project is to add (more or less) stockalike rockets, which are partly based on real world rockets.

> 
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/hXtoB)

> 
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/h7jSX)

License: All rights reserved.

**Note:** You may edit parts of this mod and upload it to the public, if I gave you the permission for this. To get a permission, please write me a PM.

[**DOWNLOAD FROM KERBALSTUFF**](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/830/Stockalike%20Expendable%20Launch%20Vehicles)

Since this is my first stockalike mod, I would be really grateful about feedback, which things are good and what needs to be improved! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Modpacks made for this:

[TABLE=class: outer\_border, width: 600, align: center]

[TR]

[TD]**Aura Texture Pack 1.0 by Fr3aKyHDx** 

* * *

A really great looking visual overhaul of the Aura parts. Complete new textures and new FX for an even better playing experience!

**Edited <time datetime="2016-07-08T18:01:13Z" title="07/08/2016 06:01  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 8, 2016</time> by Kartoffelkuchen**

Woot! Congrats on release!

As soon as I get home from school I'm going to check this out. I've been anticipating it for a while!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-22T15:04:12Z" title="05/22/2015 03:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 22, 2015</time> by VenomousRequiem**
Looks like a try ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Awesome awesome awesome! Congratulations on this release. 

![giphy.gif](https://media.giphy.com/media/b9aScKLxdv0Y0/giphy.gif)

Would you say that this a Deltaesque Stockalike pack?
Are you going to add this to CTT?

![7db.gif](http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/851/804/7db.gif)

Just have a round of applause here~

The FX are alittle ways from the engines and did you mean to leave the blender file in the folder ? Other then that great job very nice little launcher ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

EDIT- Kerbal up your files ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)![screenshot0.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/72893034/UFO/screenshot0.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-22T17:11:09Z" title="05/22/2015 05:11  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 22, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

Yep used the texture on the interstage for the fairing which you can see are alittle darker might try and use a tank texture for the fairing and see how it looks.

EDIT- LOL looks like it's already been used and got alittle hot on the fairing.
One thing that I would like to see added is some more adapters 1.875 to 2.5 and 1.875 to 1.25. Also shrouds for the engines if we use decouplers would be cool.
I would suggest moving your Flags folder to be under SELV directly, rather than under Aura.
Yay 1.875m parts are always welcome, thank you for all your work, downloading it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I love the Idea of this mod, however, where do I put the Whizzy Liquid Engine Cluster-5576 file? I put the SELV file in KSP's Gamedata, but I am confused as to where I put the Cluster engine model.

Thanks for your time!

If it is a .blend file, simply delete it. Somehow the have found their way into the zip file, I can't delete them right now because I am kinda on holiday until Monday. Only folders, pngs mu files and cfg files should be in your gamedata folder. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Thanks for all your very positive feedback guys! :]

So, I have started a new career and put this mod in. Haven't had a chance to try it yet but I did have a chance to get that first 4 nozzle engine. With 100 thrust. And 391 VAC ISP.

You sir are my hero! I would give you more rep but I think it is too soon since last time. Let me try anyway.

I love this mod. I have it as one of my base mods now. I like career mode a lot, but feel it just needs a little extra for my playstyle. 

Thanks a lot! 

I'll keep track of issues if I have any. None so far.

**Version 1.1 released!**

What's new?

- 2.5m Engine (LV-65 "Peacewalker")
- 2.5m Long Fuel Tank

Doesn't sound too much, though it makes really fun to play with it and it offers many new possibilites, for example an ICBM:

![Atlas-B_ICBM.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/87/Atlas-B_ICBM.jpg)![n4jafsZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/n4jafsZ.png)

or an early Atlas rocket:

![270px-DF-SC-99-00074_cropped_and_rotated.jpeg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2f/DF-SC-99-00074_cropped_and_rotated.jpeg/270px-DF-SC-99-00074_cropped_and_rotated.jpeg)![0Jo2VEf.png](http://i.imgur.com/0Jo2VEf.png)![FL4yJvv.png](http://i.imgur.com/FL4yJvv.png)

or the Mercury - Atlas variation:

![Mercury-Atlas_3_launch.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/d/d1/Mercury-Atlas_3_launch.jpg)![tnSI3ok.png](http://i.imgur.com/tnSI3ok.png)

You can download the new version from [***Kerbalstuff***](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/830/Stockalike%20Expendable%20Launch%20Vehicles)

Note: Those parts are not correctly embedded in the techtree yet, they will get included later but for now they are not!
Thanks for the update this are great little launchers ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
This pack looks great! I must say, you have skills sir. Keep it up.

I really do wish we had a better upperstage rocket with this pack. The upper stage rocket engine as is is far too weak to launch higher payloads into a full orbit. The poodle is 250 in vac, and the LV is 60, while yours is only 100. Could you possibly make something like a skipper for heavier payloads?

Yes, heavier engines are planned for the new rocket. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) As an alternative to Whizzy, you could also use the LV-X5 with a medium fuel tank instead of a short fuel tank, it has much more power.
Yeah that's what I had to do if I wanted to lift say 12 tons to 500km orbits using an Aura heavy.

Who ever said they had to be expendable? \*pics to follow\*

would be nice to have a 1.875 meter probe core to fit in this.
I've also noticed a bug where the larger engine will not launch off if you don't use launch towers. It acts like it is "stuck" in the ground.

> 
> I've also noticed a bug where the larger engine will not launch off if you don't use launch towers. It acts like it is "stuck" in the ground.

Confirmed and will be fixed!![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
